name: Logoff: No warning when user clicks Logout link
description: When the Logout link is clicked, the application should display a message asking whether the user is sure he/she wants to continue logging out.

name: System Performance suffers for constant loads of only 1,000 users
description: The system experiences noticeable degradation in performance for loads of only 1,000 concurrent users.

name: Language Support:  Special Characters
description: Special characters in both Japanese and French are not being displayed properly.

name: Customer is not able to choose Japanese as their display language
description: Japanese is not appearing in the 'Select Language' drop down.

name: Login 404 Issue
description: Received an Error 404 warning on entrance to the application.

name: Authentication Hyperlink is broken
description:
Currently, the authentication hyperlink provided to the customer via email is broken.  Following the link brings the customer to the homepage, but the customer has not been validated.

Steps:
  • Created a new customer account
  • Received an email that contained a hyperlink to complete authentication
  • Clicking the link brought me to the homepage of the app
  • On login, I had yet to be authenticated so shopping could proceed

name: 404 on address page
Unable to check status of archived orders
Unable to open an order from history
Found an error when I tried to access my shopping cart
description: I was taken to the checkout screen prematurely

name: Problem with User Authentication
description: More than one customer is reporting that they are being logged off of the system

name: BZ: Could not login to app
description: Customer could not login.

name: Application displays individual shipping costs but total is unchanged
description: The individual estimated shipping costs for each package/destination are displayed, but the Total field only displays the shipping cost for the first destination in the list.  Also, once a customer checks out, the total for the entire order only reflects shipping for one destination.

name: Tax totals for split shipping not calculated properly
UI for split - need more separation on order sections
Click on split shipping - nothing displays
Priority shipping options not appearing for multiple destinations
description: Having a shopping cart that contained 2 items, I chose to ship the items to two different destinations.  The individual destination buckets appeared appropriately, however there were no visible priority shipping options for either destination.

name: No warning when MAX destinations has been reached
description: Once a customer has elected to ship items to the maximum number of different destinations, the add destination button is disabled, but no warning is displayed explaining why.

name: Too many digits appearing for updated shipping cost
description: Total shipping cost should be displayed as '$XXX.XX', but currently the total has 5 digits after the decimal ($23.78352).

name: Package Tracking Notifications are broken
description: Only one tracking notification is being sent to the customer when they have packages being shipped to multiple destinations.  The system should send an email for packages being sent to each destination.

name: Default selection is Express
description: The default selection for priority shipping is currently Express, it should instead be Ground.

name: Payment by e-Check failing on submit
description: Error message indicating 'Gateway 502' problem.

name: No warning when 18digits given for credit card
description: Able to add 1 extra digit to credit card input box

name: Browser shows non-validated security key on payment form page
description: Browser prompts to confirm security exception.

name: Only one selected item is being added to the cart
description:
Steps:
  • Logged in as a customer
  • Selected multiple items to add to cart at once
  • Clicked 'Add to Cart'
  • Clicked 'View My Cart'
  • Only the first item chosen was actually added to the cart

name: Recurring 'No Address' Warning
description:
Steps:
  • Created a new account, but didn't enter an address
  • Logged in as the new user, system displayed a message asking for address information
  • Enter a valid address and click save
  • For every following action within the same shopping session, the system warned that no address information had been entered, even though it was still saved and visible

name: Production Defect in accessing shopping cart
description: Error 404 - Not Found when trying to navigate to the shopping cart.

name: State drop down doesn't contain any items
description:
The customer should enter the following shipping information:

  • Name
  • Address
  • City
  • State (drop down)
  • Country (drop down)
  • Zip/Country Code

name: Code verification completely broken!
description:
The application accepts any 6 character long string as a valid promotional code and applies the maximum discount to the order!

Steps:
  • Logged in as a customer, choose a few items to purchase
  • Enter an invalid promotional code (of correct length) in the editable field
  • Click update
  • Maximum discount is applied to the order
This occurs for any codes entered that contain 6 characters.

name: (Auto) Fitnesse Test Failed for GUI - Checkout Button
description: Please see Fitnesse Result Logs for more information.

name: latest Promo Code is invalid.
description:
On the payment screen, the Promo Code field label formatting is incorrect.  Currently it is bold and italic, thought it should just be bold to match the rest of the field labels.

Promo Code -> Promo Code

name: (Auto) Fitnesse Test Failed for Calculations
description: Please see Fitnesse Result Logs for more information.

name: Weird formatting -> Totals GUI
description: The formatting for the totals/costs GUI is distorted.  The total cost field is appearing on the very left side of the browser, when it should be beneath all of the other calculation fields on the right side of the browser.

name: Unable to login after entering reset password
User's password shown in plain text in recovery email
Button color on checkout page does not match blue hue per design specs
Old font found on contact us page
Unable to login after entering invalid password
"Remember me" cookie not working
Monthly product re-order is duplicating items
Unable to check status of past orders
Unable to undelete an order from history
302 response code on /api page
Unable to connect to staging server with 'v2.0' string
CCV codes not being verified on checkout path
Mastercard not showing in valid CC dropdown list on checkout path
